_source.text: According to experts in the field, there are about 27 million slaves today-not merely people living in crowded slums, doing backbreaking work for low pay, or lacking human rights-but slaves, people who can't walk away, can't quit, can't leave because they or their families will be threatened, beaten, or worse.
